definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

sentences.english: Know your paradigm and live it without excuses.
sentences.chinese: 知道你自己心中的标尺，无理由的相信它。

sentences.english: Responsibility is the ruler, can measure.
sentences.chinese: 责任是标尺，丈量可否行。

sentences.english: It's also on a vernier, a sliding scale.
sentences.chinese: 这也是在游标尺上，可选择的。

sentences.english: Universal suffrage is thus the gauge of the maturity of the working class.
sentences.chinese: 因此，普选制是测量工人阶级成熟性的标尺。

sentences.english: The result of the experiments indicates that magnetic scale coding is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 通过实验研究，验证了磁性标尺的数字编码是可行的。

sentences.english: The overview ruler can also indicate other points of interest in your editor.
sentences.chinese: 概览标尺还可以表示编辑器中其他需要注意的位置。

sentences.english: The engine oil level is checked using a dipstick in the engine.
sentences.chinese: 发动机使用一个标尺检查发动机油位。

sentences.english: With a pair of stereo-criterion, in addition, the relative heights of targets, e. g. , topography can be measured.
sentences.chinese: 另外备有高度标尺，可以估计地形的相对高度。

sentences.english: The media are the arbiters of a successful Games.
sentences.chinese: 外国媒体是衡量一届奥运会成功与否的重要标尺。

sentences.english: Her personal life set a Hollywood standard for glamour and tumult.
sentences.chinese: 她的个人生活成为好莱坞风流韵事的标尺。

sentences.english: Make use of people to give your images life and scale.
sentences.chinese: 利用人物来给你的照片增添生气和标尺。

sentences.english: The simple Vernier scale is clearly marked for good visibility.
sentences.chinese: 简单的游标尺的刻度清晰，具并且可见度很高。

sentences.english: One commonly used feature is rulers.
sentences.chinese: 一个常用的特性是标尺。

sentences.english: Yield is an important measure of theincome you earn on an investment.
sentences.chinese: 收益率是衡量你的投资所得收入多少的重要标尺。

sentences.english: Never let problems become a measurement of your value as a person.
sentences.chinese: 绝不要让问题成为衡量你人生价值的标尺。

sentences.english: In this text, the facture and the clinical ap- plication of the graticule will be described in detail.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了这种标尺板的制作与临床应用。

definition: the zero point indicator marked on a steelyard/fixed opinion/solid idea/decisive plan
touchstone/fig. test that sth is genuine
whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
standard weight (used on a balance scale)
